module.name: socolissimo
module.description: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: PrestaShop brings you the Colissimo delivery options module: a turnkey solution offering all of Colissimo's services for delivery to France and in Europe. 48h delivery service to home addresses or collection points.
module.additional_description: Front page benetifs :An easy and quick installation that allows you to make all your national and international Colissimo withdrawal points available to your e-buyersEntering the tariff point withdrawal directly on Prestashop A customization of the front page point withdrawal in harmony with the design of your site Colissimo simplicité benefits : A free solution with no need for development, easy to install from your Prestashop back-office.An "iframe" delivery page that is consistent with the site, thus ensuring continuity in the buying process.A wide range of shipping methods to meet the needs of your e-buyers.Increased revenue through the Colissimo service in EuropeAccess to a dedicated customer area in the "Colissimo Box" and a tracking tool for your shipments: ColiView.A mobile version of the module to ensure compatibility and consistent sales throughout the day. This module will help you generate additional sales thanks to your multichannel presence.NB: This module is for traders with a SIRET French business identification number.

module.name: hipay_professional
module.description: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage your online transactions without a distance-selling (VAD) contract and with an integrated anti-fraud system. You can access all international and local payment solutions (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, Payshop, Boleto bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: moneybookers
module.description: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 cur
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Trusted by millions across the globe Skrill meets the needs of more than 156,000 businesses worldwide providing a convenient and secure way to send and receive money in nearly 200 countries and 40 currencies.
module.additional_description: Free and quick setupAccess 100+ local payment solutions with 1 easy integrationConnect with 30+ million Skrill account holdersHighest security standards and anti-fraud technologySeamless payment experience across mobile, tablet and desktop

module.name: paypal
module.description: As the leading online payment company,PayPal offers a range of easy,fluid & secure solutions trusted by more than 220M users
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As the leading online payment company,PayPal offers a range of easy,fluid & secure solutions trusted by more than 220M users. With this module,benefit from our complete payment platform and grow your business online,on mobile & internationally
module.additional_description: Easy to activate: With PayPal you can start accepting payments almost instantly without any setup fee! Increase your conversion rate up to 87.5%* thanks to our mobile optimized solutions, without the need for any additional integration. And with One Touch™, your buyers can pay their purchases faster than ever! Seller Protection: Protect your incomes against online fraud thanks to our Seller Protection. We cover tangible and intangible goods as well as most services.  A crystal clear fee policy and no surprises. No hidden fees. A commission fee applies only when you receive a payment. And the more you receive transactions the less it costs you.  *Conversion rate with One Touch™, calculated during 4th quarter 2015 as part of a comScore study. Sample group in the US.

module.name: mondialrelay
module.description: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The Mondial Relay module developed with Prestashop allows stores to use the deliveries by Point Relais® (over 6300 traders proximity) and at home in France and Europe. Mondial Relay shares his expertise with all merchants, regardless of their level of activity, proposing an offer without prerequisites of parcels quantity, without commitment period and no management fees or subscription.
module.additional_description: With this module, you will have a wider choice of delivery modes, your customers will appreciate the ability to be delivered by Point Relais® which you will improve your conversion rate.

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.displayName: Boxtal Shipping - pick up, door to door, express
module.description: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Manage multiple carriers using one single module and save up to 75% on your shipping costs without commitments or any contracts.
module.additional_description: 1. IMPROVE YOUR CONVERSION RATESGive a choice between different shipping options which suit best your clients : pick up stations (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, etc.), standard (Colissimo, Happy-Post, etc.), express (Chronopost, FedEx, DHL Express, UPS, TNT Express, etc.). 2. REDUCE YOUR SHIPPING COSTSSave up to 75% on your shipping costs with the best shipping services without commitments or any contracts. 3. SAVE TIME ON MANAGING YOUR SHIPMENTSPrint shipping labels directly from your PrestaShop back-office. Track, cancel or reschedule your orders in one place. One single invoice for all shipping services. 4. ACCELERATE YOUR WEBSITE LAUNCH One single plugin to manage all your shipments. Boxtal is your only contact before, during and after delivery, whatever carriers were selected. Save time and focus on the essential of your business.

module.name: ogone
module.description: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone&n
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ingenico ePayments*: Online payment services to boost conversion   We offer innovative ecommerce solutions for more than 160,000 customers in Europe and worldwide   *Formely known as Ogone
module.additional_description: There are many ways your business benefits from choosing Ingenico ePayments as its payments partner : We process and secure internet payments. Whether you have an online or mobile webshop, or take orders by phone, we'll help you accept payments, receive funds, and protect your business from fraudsters.

module.description: Accept cash on delivery payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Accept cash on delivery payments

module.name: prestafraud
module.description: Protect your store from fraudulent payments
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Protect your store from fraudulent payments

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines (Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping and many others)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: A single platform to List, Sync, and Manage your products and orders with the world's largest marketplaces and shopping engines (Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping and many others).
module.additional_description: Sell your products List on Amazon, eBay, Google Shopping, Bing Ads, 11 Main, Rakuten, eBay Commerce Network, shopping.com, Shopzilla, PriceGrabber, and more than 1000 other sales channels internationally. Enhance Your Data Our DataFix Toolbox easily patches holes in your product data that would otherwise prevent you from listing and selling your products on a sales channel. Never Pay for Setup Shopping Feed's Automated setup gets you up and running on your favorite sales channels in a flash. Our dedicated support team will make sure you get connected, no matter how complicated the setup.

module.name: autoupgrade
module.description: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Upgrade your shop to the latest version of PrestaShop in a few clicks, thanks to this automated method. By running the most recent version of PrestaShop, you will benefit from the latest features and improvements available. For this reason (and for your shop security) it is always recommended to use an up-to-date version.
module.additional_description: The easiest way to upgrade your PrestaShop store!

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!﻿

module.name: gsitemap
module.description: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Generate your Google sitemap file. This module helps you build a sitemap for your shop, and keep it up to date.
module.additional_description: Optimize natural search (SEO) on all search engines (Google, Bing, Yahoo...) with this module that will facilitate indexation of your pages and products by search engines

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Show your ad to people at the very moment they are searching for what you offer. Google and PrestaShop increase your advertising investment by offering £75 after the first spent £25  (or 75€ for 25€ if you are not based in the UK) !  Download the module to get your promotional code and start your campaign now !
module.additional_description: Are you looking for new clients online? Prestashop has partnered with Google to help you find them. With Google AdWords, you can display your ads on Google and its advertising network. This makes your business visible online to potential customers. To help you get started, we've partnered with Google to give you £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign.  Receive £75* in advertising credit when you spend £25 on your first AdWords campaign. Or call 08001690713

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendinBlue : THE all-in-one module for your (marketing and transactional) email, newsletter & SMS. Synchronize your Prestashop subscribers with SendinBlue, easily create beautiful email campaigns and efficiently communicate with your prospects and clients.
module.additional_description: With SendinBlue, you can:Automatically synchronize your contacts on SendinBlue and pull up your salesCreate and send beautiful newslettersOptimize deliverability in inbox of your transactional mails (subscription, order confirmation, etc.)Follow results of your sendings in real timeEnjoy of a dedicated customer service, by phone or EmailSee our tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/en/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: payplug
module.description: PlayPlug is a payment solution allowing merchants to accept online payments directly from Visa, MasterCard and CB cards, both online and via mobile
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PlayPlug is a payment solution allowing merchants to accept online payments directly from Visa, MasterCard and CB cards, both online and via mobile.
module.additional_description: PayPlug’s primary goal is to meet the specific needs of small and medium e-commerce companies :Simple set up and managementSafetyOptimized conversionSupport

module.additional_description: Use this native module to:Create a showcase: display your store’s best selling items directly on your front office and boost your sales.Create a separate page in addition to the block: your visitors will have a clear idea of your most purchased products.

module.author: PrestaShop

module.name: graphnvd3
module.description: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module enables the NVD3 charting code for your own uses, providing you with ever so useful graphs. It is required by other dashboard modules. NVD3 (http://nvd3.org/) is JavaScript library that was built specifically to generate beautiful charts using D3.js (http://d3js.org/), a JavaScript library built to manipulate documents based on data.

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Displays the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found. This module adds a tab to the Stats dashboard, showing the pages requested by your visitors that have not been found.
module.additional_description: This page tells you which pages of your catalog people have attempted to access but could not find (resulting in what is called "HTTP 404" errors). This is useful for finding potential technical problems that may hinder your sales.

module.name: onboarding

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The OnBoarding module greets first-time users to their PrestaShop back office: through a small playful interface, it shows the user how to launch his/her shop in several easy steps.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping! This module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping (Amazon & Facebook soon to come)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping! This module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping (Amazon & Facebook soon to come). Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop ADS software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop ADS module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop ADS module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focussing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop ADS  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

module.name: paygreen
module.description: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayGreen allows you to simply accept credit card payments on your online store PrestaShop (with or without bank contract )
module.additional_description: This payment module allows you to customize your payment page:Your payment page with your colorsOccasionally organize fundraising operations for organizations of your choiceEnable / Disable 3D secure systemSubmit a recurring payment to your customers Our pricing is based on your monthly sales volume : PayGreen is one of the most economical solutions on the market. Our pricing fits your monthly turnover.

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: chronopost
module.description: Opt in favor of the first express delivery service at home, which delivers + 130 million parcels every year in 230 countries
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Opt in favor of the first express delivery service at home, which delivers + 130 million parcels every year in 230 countries.
module.additional_description: With the Chronopost extension, you partner with a reliable delivery service which will guarantee all your shipments Expand your activity in France and abroad in a glance :No software development needed, all the logistics functionality are already included. You customers will easily access to all the delivery services provide by the extension and contractualized. Simple and quick installation and configuration of the extension, will allow you to start your activities promptly. In case of needed Chronopost will provide you a technical support

module.name: securitypatch
module.description: This module improves your shop's safety by applying the latest security patches from PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module improves your shop's safety by applying the latest security patches from PrestaShop.

module.name: brainify
module.description: Gain time and make the best possible marketing decisions thanks to E-commerce analytics.Take control of your data
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Gain time and make the best possible marketing decisions thanks to E-commerce analytics.Take control of your data.
module.additional_description: Managing your e-commerce site has never been so simple. Brainify Free Dashboard focuses on the key elements of the online sale cycle and summarises this strategic data in the form of an array of dashboards.  At each key step in your selling cycle you will be guided by a beautifully designed dashboard, summarising the essential data. 1.     Acquisition2.     Sales3.     Products4.     Costumers5.     Cross sell Don’t miss an important event and gain time by leaving Brainify to summarise the most important elements of your commercial strategy.Don’t let the secrets of your data pass you by damaging your daily turnover. Receive suggestions of performance enhancing tools to improve your performance. Take control of your e-business and join the e commerce republic thanks to free e-commerce analytics.The magic is in your data, it becomes a toy to help you to act more quickly by enabling a simple and efficient understanding.

module.name: smartsupp
module.description: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Smartsupp is a free live chat with visitor recording. Your customers are on your website right now. Chat with them and see what they do.
module.additional_description: Try a free live chat with visitor recording Smartsupp is a combination of live chat and visitor recording, making it the only tool you’ll need to get to understand your visitors. With Smartsupp you can chat with visitors in real-time and also watch their behavior on your website. Know everything about your visitors The Smartsupp plugin lets you identify details of your visitors, like their name, email, or other categories you deem important. You can see all these details while chatting with that visitor so that you know who you’re chatting with (e.g., Tom Smith, who already spent $800 on your website). The visitor has to be signed in on your website for you to be able to see the info. Chat with your visitors in real time Smartsupp allows you to help your visitors as soon as they need assistance. You’re able to answer their questions instantly in the on-site chat box. If you notice similar situations arising, create and use canned replies and automatic messages to save time. With this fully customizable, multi-language live chat, you can increase your sales up to five times. Record the screens of your visitors Watch video recordings of any visitor on your website in the Smartsupp dashboard. You’ll see their screen, mouse movements, and clicks — great for understanding the behavior of your customers. The powerful combination of live chat and visitor recordings lets you know customers’ needs even before they make a final decision. Smartsupp helps you keep them on the right track.

module.name: amzpayments

module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: A trusted and familiar payment solution which allows customers to use one familiar login to identify themselves and transact on your site. Amazon Pay can help you build, maintain loyal customers and as a result increase your sales.
module.additional_description: Amazon Pay can help you to:Build customer loyaltyAcquire new customersIncrease conversionReduce fraudOptimize the mobile checkout experience Sign-up now for Amazon Pay!

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SendCloud is Europe’s number 1 shipping tool for e-commerce. We provide an all-in-one solution that helps to optimize your full shipping workflow. Save time and focus on what matters most: growing your online business.
module.additional_description: With SendCloud you can optimize your full shipping process. From importing orders, printing shipping labels, picking & packing orders, sending personalized tracking mails to managing returns, you can automate every step in your shipping process. Over 10.000 online stores are using SendCloud, join the revolution today!

module.description: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Directly incorporated into the Prestashop back office, you can easily synchronise your contacts and create all your emails, newsletters, and SMS to communicate more efficiently with your clients. Test it and enjoy 10 000 emails and 100 free SMS!
module.additional_description: Thanks to Digitaleo: -          Save time thanks to the contact synchronization between Prestashop and Digitaleo-          Segment your contacts and easily create lists to communicate in a more focused and relevant way-          Send high quality and responsive emails thanks to the huge variety of templates one can customize-          Increase your customer loyalty by sending them personalized messages-          Generate more traffic to your website by informing your current and potential clients about promotions or new products-          Simplify  your tasks by programming the date and time you want to send in your emails-          Optimise your marketing campaigns by accessing your detailed statistics-          Ensuring an optimised deliver ratio in your emails and SMS-          Enjoy a technical support expert in your activity sector

module.name: worldfirst
module.description: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: World First – International Payments for Your BusinessInternational payments and foreign exchange solutions for businesses and online marketplace sellers.
module.additional_description: WorldFirst help you make international money transfers quickly, securely and at fantastic exchange rates, which could save you money compared to your bank or online marketplace. So if you need to pay overseas suppliers or repatriate earnings from international marketplaces like Amazon, Newegg or Cdiscount, WorldFirst can help. Click the button in the panel to register your interest with WorldFirst and a member of their team will be in touch to discuss opening an account. Please note this service is available in English, French, Dutch, Chinese and Japanese.

module.name: stripe_official
module.description: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Increase your conversion rate and charge payments securely with Stripe, the easiest way to accept online payments.​Install Stripe's plugin on your PrestaShop online store, create a Stripe account, and start accepting payments immediately.
module.additional_description: Create your Stripe account in 10 minutes and immediately start accepting payments via Visa, MasterCard and American Express (no additional contract/merchant ID needed from your bank)Improve your conversion rate by offering a seamless payment experience to your customers: Stripe lets you host the payment form on your own pages, without redirection to a bank third-part pageKeep your fraud under control thanks to customizable 3D-Secure and Stripe Radar, our suite of anti-fraud toolsHundreds of third-part integrations to enrich your Stripe set-up (invoicing, SMS...) This plugin fully relies on Stripe.js to generate a token that gets used to create the charge with Stripe: sensitive data will never hit your servers, maintaining a high level of security and preventing you from a heavy PCI/DSS certification.

module.name: ps_emailsmanager
module.description: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store&rsq
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Adapt your emails’ design to your site’s visual identity, to your business, or to the time of the year with the native Email Template Manager module, available by default in your store’s back office! This free module allows you to easily modify the template of your transactional emails, such as the registration confirmation or order confirmation, without hiring a designer.
module.additional_description: This email template installation and management module allows you to interchange and modify your different templates and save your configurations. Depending on the design and level of customization that the developer has allowed, your templates can be customized and allow you to:   modify the emails’ main and secondary colorschoose the text's fontadd links to your social networks and modify their logosinsert images and additional text This tool also allows you to save your transactional emails and the default PrestaShop design. Finally, you don't have to write or translate your emails’ content: the template automatically retrieves the default translations available for the transactional email in PrestaShop!

module.name: feedbiz
module.description: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.author: Common-Services
module.description_full: Cdiscount Flux manages & automates your catalog and your orders from the Cdiscount marketplace
module.additional_description: You configure once and then magic occurs ; everything becomes automatic ! This means that you no longer need to connect to multiple back-offices, you manage everything from Prestashop. Cdiscount Flux is a cloud-based, self-contained solution that enables you to automate the management of catalog, orders, order tracking. You no longer have to worry about inventory updates, new product creations, Cdiscount Flux automatically manages feeds to and from Cdiscount marketplace. Cdiscount Flux automatically imports your orders into Prestashop, updates quantities, prices, manages repricing, invoice sendings and many other features. Cdiscount Flux is not a feed integrator or aggregator but a cloud solution that allows you to manage your own feeds. You boost your sales thanks to the traffic and sales generated by Cdiscount and Cdiscount Flux automatically manages the entire sales process and listing. You benefit from all features offered by Cdiscount, free 4 times payment handled by Cdiscount, multiple delivery methods (home delivery and collection point), repricing (price adjustment) and more.The support is reactive and free, 5 agents are permanently at your disposal to answer your questions.

module.name: adroll
module.description: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Integrate your PrestaShop store with AdRoll to start attracting new visitors to your online store, bringing back and converting site visitors and driving more revenue with existing customers.
module.additional_description: On average, only 96-98% of e-commerce store visitors leave before completing a purchase. AdRoll retargeting helps you reach those lost visitors personalized product recommendation ads across devices on the Web, Email, Facebook and Instagram. Our PrestaShop customers average a 7x ROI when using AdRoll: For every $10 spent, they see $70 in attributable revenue to AdRoll! This PrestaShop module streamlines the onboarding experience with AdRoll so you can start driving more sales faster! In just a few clicks, your store will be set up with the AdRoll pixel, essential audience segments, ROI/revenue tracking, and your synchronized product catalog for dynamic product recommendation ads. Other benefits:Use AdRoll to attract new visitors and retarget existing visitors across the web, mobile and Facebook.Make more sales and solve shopping cart abandonment like our 25,000+ customers.No minimums.Customer Support via Email, Chat & Phone.We'll even give you free ads!

module.name: cleverreach
module.description: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Spotify, Bugatti & DHL send their newsletters with CleverReach®. Why? Because it’s that simple. Benefit from our extensive software & flexible pricing without contract duration.
module.additional_description: The module directly connects our CleverReach® Email Marketing tool with your PrestaShop. All your important „PrestaShop data“ will instantly and automatically be updated and completed in the CleverReach® newsletter tool. The synchronization saves you time and trouble.  At the same time, you avoid errors that often occur during a manual import and export. Synchronized PrestaShop data:  Newsletter subscriptions and unsubscribesFirst and last name, interests, gender, age, birthday, address details … purchased items, revenue, frequency of purchases, average shopping cart, order number, item number, product name, price, currency, quantity, amount product details of your PrestaShop products like image, text, price, size, material … It’s as simple as that! Use valuable data to create personal offers your customers really want. Your benefits: more opens, more clicks and more conversions! This is the key to increasing sales: your customers buy more and more frequently – Profit. Profit. Profit.  Click on the top right „Download “-button now to download the module and install it in the PrestaShop backend without any great effort.  Afterwards, quickly and easily connect your PrestaShop with CleverReach®, synchronize your shop data and create and send your first email.  CleverReach® is the provider for email marketing for more than 190,000 customers, e.g. Spotify, Levi’s, Playboy, DHL and Amnesty International, in 152 countries. CleverReach® was founded in 2007 in Germany and complies with the highest standards of data protection. Exclusively for PrestaShop customers:Get a 10% discount off your CleverReach® rate for 12 months! Email marketing made easier: discount will automatically provided when creating a new account.

Get the best carriers offers with special discount up to -75% through our integrated solution which makes your shipment management flexible, easy and fast: improve your carrier service quality and your customers’ satisfaction.

module.additional_description: See detailed campaign reports—from engagement to ROI—so you can sell more stuff.Sync and segment your list, then send targeted campaigns based on things like products purchased and amount spent over time.Create abandoned cart emails, send product recommendations, and more.Follow up with, delight, and re-engage your customers using pre-built customer lifecycle automations.Design and send personalized transactional messages—like shipping notifications, invoices, and more—directly through MailChimp.

module.additional_description: Get screenshots of your pages.Test on real devices.Boost your ROI. Facilitates conversion.Secure your business with a quality website.Optimizes the purchase tunnel and improve security.With a bug free website, no excuse for the customer to finalize the command.

module.name: ns8csp
module.description: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Protect your store from the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance. Reduce your store’s chargebacks, increase the effectiveness of your ad campaigns, and ensure quality of your site’s user experience.
module.additional_description: NS8 Protect uses industry-leading techniques in behavioral analytics, real-time user scoring, and global monitoring to identify bots and other malicious activity in your storefront. As a platform-based approach to online threat reduction, NS8 Protect is designed to help your store fight the three big revenue killers: order fraud, advertising fraud, and poor performance.  Revenue Killer #1: Order FraudNS8 Protect scores every visitor to your storefront. Every action taken by the visitor leading up to and including placing an order is scored individually and reflected in the EQ8 Score. Low-scoring orders are most likely fraudulent and may be held or flagged for manual review. NS8 Protect also provides automated tools to escalate suspect orders or even request e-mail and SMS text verification from the visitor. The mix of automated tools and easier manual reviews empowers merchants to optimize their order processing and minimize risk.  Benefit from the network of stores and websites already tagging fraudulent users and suspicious behavior by using NS8 software.Reduce costly chargebacks and the risk they pose to your merchant account.Reduce both the labor dedicated to manual review and shipping lead times.Set your own custom threshold for suspect orders and users. Revenue Killer #2: Advertising Fraud Advertising fraud (especially remarketing fraud) is a huge and growing issue for online merchants. NS8 Protect not only scores all traffic visiting your store, but it also detects and records the traffic’s source. You will see when, and which, advertising sources are delivering low-quality, high-risk, fraudulent traffic. You will be able to save money and increase revenue by eliminating poorly performing campaigns and focusing your budget on the successful campaigns that deliver results.                        Compare scored campaigns for the presence of bot traffic and fraud.Prevent bots and fraudulent users from being tagged for remarketing.Integrate with Google Analytics to tag high-value users for more effective remarketing.Track your store’s advertising savings from blocked fraudulent users. Revenue Killer #3: Poor Performance NS8 Protect includes 5 critical monitors that every PrestaShop store should have. If and when an issue arises, escalating text messages are sent to you and your staff warning of potential or actual problems. Monitor your store’s technical performance. If your store becomes slow or unresponsive due to plugin conflicts or other changes, you will be immediately notified.Monitor your store’s global performance relative to other eCommerce stores.Monitor your store’s encryption certificates. If your store’s certificate expires, users will be warned against using your service. NS8 will alert you first, before the all-important certificate expires.Monitor spam and malware blacklists for your store’s domain. If your store finds itself listed, maliciously or accidentally, NS8 Protect will alert you and direct you towards a solution.

module.name: recolize
module.description: Personalization is a Must-Have for every PrestaShop. Maximize revenue, minimize effort. Easy as pie with Recolize! Use for free, no credit card required
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Personalization is a Must-Have for every PrestaShop. Maximize revenue, minimize effort. Easy as pie with Recolize! Use for free, no credit card required.
module.additional_description: Did you know that most of your shop visitors leave without any interaction?Optimize your traffic with fully-automated personalized product recommendations and excite your customers with the right products at the right time. Your customers will thank you with much higher conversion rates up to 4 timesadditional revenue up to 20 %an improved average order value Start now with the Recolize Plug & Play solution for free.Success-based pricing: after 300 clicks on recommendations for free each month you pay only 0,039 € per click.

module.name: ekomiratingsandreviews
module.description: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Seamlessly integrate eKomi seller and product review collection with your Prestashop account. Review requests are automatically triggered from your shop backend, and any product reviews will be displayed automatically on corresponding product pages.
module.additional_description: eKomi is the leading third-party review service, specializing in the collection, management and publishing of seller and product reviews and ratings for businesses. Thanks to our constant innovation and market-leading technology, we offer the most varied and flexible review generation methods, allowing you to reach all your clients to pro-actively request their feedback.Automatically collect and display authentic seller and product ratings and reviews.Increase trust in your business and boost customer loyalty to increase sales.Activate your Seller Rating Extension to display stars on your Google Ads and increase your Click-through-rate by 17%.Drive more qualified traffic to your siteIncentivise further purchases with our integrated coupon feature.Decrease returns by displaying product reviews on your corresponding product pages.Overall, the more ratings you get for your business, the more traffic you drive to your site, the more trust you create among current and potential clients, and the more you will boost your sales and ROI - so get started today!

module.name: snapcall
module.description: SnapCall is a digital button that will allow your customers to call you directly from your site
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: SnapCall is a digital button that will allow your customers to call you directly from your site. The call will arrive on an application (smartphone / tablet) by displaying the name, the first name and the detail of the basket of the customer.
module.additional_description: - Simplify the customer relationship: by allowing customers, in one click and without changing media, to contact the competent person to provide information -> Increase of the loyalty rate- Demultiply your qualified contacts: focus on the strategic points of the purchase tunnel and prospects with high potential -> Lower acquisition costs- Convert your prospects into customers: by responding to the users just when they have themneed to conclude a transaction -> Transformation rate development

Integrate the Urb-it service on your website, as a white label or not, according to your strategy. Discover the Urb-it delivery serviceOur strength is our Urbers for 3 main reasons:A demanding certification3 meetings with the team3h of training25% of the candidates are selected in the endThe creation of a strong social link thanks to a solid community350 Urbers23 years of age on average50% of girls, 50% of boysThe quality of the service because the UrbersWalk and use public transportation meansBear great attention and care to the productsAre casually dressed and are not recognisable

module.name: psaddonsconnect
module.description: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: 2 in 1: Make security or functional updates easier for all modules in your store and take advantage of an e-commerce tip each week to help you on your way.
module.additional_description: Once connected to your PrestaShop Addons account with this module, you:will benefit each week from an e-commerce tip, that is a tip to follow related to the e-commerce calendar, which you will find directly on your dashboard (ex: when and how to prepare for Black Friday, back to school promotions, etc.)protect your store by staying up-to-date with the latest on security for modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addonstake advantage of new features added to modules you have downloaded from PrestaShop Addons

module.name: touchize
module.description: Make mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable with Drag-2-Buy, increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 30-day free trial
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Make mobile shopping faster, easier and more enjoyable with Drag-2-Buy, increasing loyalty and boosting mobile sales. Easy one-click installation and 30-day free trial.
module.additional_description: A unique mobile shopping experience for your customersBy optimizing webshop your with Drag-2-Buy for touch screens on smartphones and tablets, Touchize Commerce gives your customers a unique mobile shopping experienceCustomers can easily navigate and discover products, learn more about their variants and with a simple gesture add them to the cart on each shopping occasionDrag-2-Buy increases customer satisfaction and customer loyalty  An easy tool to grow your online mobile sales Consumers get an easy, straightforward mobile shopping experience. It’s just like shopping in a physical store. They simply put the product in the cart and go to payTouchize Commerce experience empowers the consumers and increases conversion rates along with more products in the shopping cart at checkout (Increased Average Order Value /AOV)You can quickly add interactive promotional banners where consumers can drag products from the banners directly to their cart  30-day free trial periodSign-up for a 30-day free trial and see how it boosts your online sales!
